Posts.Content: col43 wrote: My collarbone fractured 3 days ago and I'm in excruciating pain.  Some people keep telling me that once a lesion area fractures it will never heal.  Someone please tell me this is not true. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Any clavicle fractures from bone mets and did it heal? col43 Teen22

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2013 08:19AM col43 wrote: It's been 3 weeks now and it was starting to get less painful but when I woke up this morning I was in excruciating pain again. I'm so discouraged. Going to the radiologist next Friday to see about some spot radiation. I guess it's going to take a long time to heal and I need to get some patience.
Posts.Title: Any clavicle fractures from bone mets and did it heal? col43 Teen22

Posts.Content: Nov 7, 2013 09:44AM col43 wrote: My clavicle hardly hurts now and I'm able to use my arm more but now there is a lot of pain in the joint of that shoulder and also in the wing bone areas of my back on both sides. I don't know if these new pains are from the clavicle injury or just more bone met pain that is getting worse. I hope not.
